::Wheeljack was hit by some of the eyebeams and fired 25 shots at Ignatius:=
: 
~~~~~ 
Ignatius curled his wings around him allowing them to take the da=
mage from Wheeljacks shots. The eagle transformed to robot and pulled his t=
alons from his side. the tips pointed forward and fired 25 gattling blasts =
each at Wheeljack. "Slayer, you alright?" Ignatius looked around and notice=
d Slayer had disapeared. "Now whered that hotheaded wolf go to? We're suppo=
sed to be working as a team." he thought wondering how long it had been sin=
ce he lost his partner.

::The energy beam misses Sharpedge.  he fires 2 mi=
ssles at Hammer:: 
~~~~~ 
::The energy beam misses Godfather, but he gets h=
it by all the shots.  he 
fires 15 shots from one pistol at Hammer and 15 s=
hots from the other at 
Bullet:: 
Hammer continues sweeping the battlefield=
 with the energy beam, it easily destroys the missles but can't move fast e=
nough to block the shots from Godfather. Most of the shots find thier mark =
causing him to wince with pain. the shots started out fealing like pinprick=
s and then got worse as the damage got worse, they now fealt more like bee =
stings than pinpricks. Prebon hadn't thought out his battle plan enough for=
 it to be effective on anyone but the Trainers.

Bullet crossed his arms in=
 frint of his face avoiding the nuisance of the shots hitting his face. He =
was quickly becoming irritated by all the unwanted attention the alliance b=
ots were giving him. He raised his rifle and fired five shots at Godfather =
and a force blast at Sharpedge.
